Лучшее что когда либо сделало Valve. У меня все.
10/10

J'ai testé ce jeu en 2012,2013 et 2019 et sincèrement peut importe les années le jeu remplit parfaitement son taff.

Les personnages sont attachants (meme notre perso muet, ce qui est pas plus mal défois), l'histoire est prenante, à chaque niveau finit j'avais qu'une seule envie : LA SUITEEEEEEEE
Les niveaux se déroulent comme une aventure logique et bien faite, j'ai aimé tout les niveaux (sauf celui en bateau qui était triste) et malgré ses graphismes de 2004 ben passe encore.
Dire que les graphismes sont moches seraient de l'hypocrisie car je sais pas combien de jeu utilise le moteur source meme en 2019 (garry's mod, No more room in hell, etc...).

Meme en y rejouant maintenant la magie marche toujours, on oublie les graphismes pour revenir un jeu qui a tout compris. Mettre la priorité sur l'immersion, les personnages et le gameplay au détriment des graphismes. Vous savez tout le contraire des jeux récents (Battleshit, Call of futur, Star wars Battlefront de EA *tousse*).

Et surtout oh mon dieu les musiques, surtout une qui je veux absolument jouer le jour de mes funérailles !

Ce jeu mérite amplement sa note sur steam et pour moi devrait etre reléguer au patrimoine mondial de l'humanité tant il frise la perfection.
One of the most innovative games ever when it was released. A must play for anyone who likes FPS games.

Half life 2.. Un gran juego que para ser viejo puede ser divertido si tus gustos son de juegos lineales de accion, 
Lo bueno
-Divertido
-Buenas jugabilidad
-Graficos buenos para la epoca
-20horas de diversion
Lo malo
-IA enemiga tonta
-IA aliada bastante retrasada (aveces te dejaban encerrado)
-Unos cuantos bugs con la IA aliado medica que se les bugea la mano

Si disfrutas de los juegos de historia lineales, Este juego es para ti

Buen juego con una buena historia, un universo interesante y un motor con fisicas acojonante, muy divertido de jugar, ya que realmente te sientes como si realmente emprendieras un viaje por ese mundo, atravesando puntos de interes de por medio, haciendolo mucho mas inmersivo que un teletransporte sin mas. 
Ademas de usar el escenario para transmitir sensaciones al jugador que le dan una ambientacion muy buena.

Помню как в далёком 2008-ом году я впревые запустил эту игру, и понеслось... Я считаю, что антология этой замечательной игры не может остаться незамеченной, ибо это - классика (ИМХО)
Плюсы :
+ Захватывающий и интриггующий сюжет (который, кстати, бывает не во многих играх)
+ Графика (на тот момент для меня была одна из лучших)
+ Физика (Думаю, в комментариях особо не нуждается :))
+ Оружие (Пускай ассортимент не слишком большой, но достаточно интерестный.)
+ Атмосфера ( Как никак для меня что-то новое - катастрофа в научно-исследовательском комплексе с последующими вытекающими последствиями.)

Даже самых незначительных минусов я не обнаружил, и до сих пор удивляюсь, как некоторые их находят......

Итог: 10 монтировок из 10. Игра принадлежит прохождению без каких-либо нареканий.

Great game, however the pace is a little slow. I almost gave up on this game after the obnoxiously long hover-boat section, but areas like Ravenholm, Highway 17, Nova Prospekt, and the citadel were a pleasure to play through. While this game has aged, it's aged very well considering how normally many older games don't. It still stands as a quality title today, which is impressive.  

I'm disappointed now considering recent news and the April Fools developer trolling that confirms that Half Life 3 has never been and will never be a thing. I can admit I'm a fan of the series now. To see a modern perspective of this series would have certainly been a treat. May you rest in peace Gordan Freeman.

初中时我注意到了这部游戏，但那时并不知道这些游戏要花钱才能玩的事实。不过，由于巨硬那含糊不清的win10用户协议，我才有了买正版的念头。
但我观望了一年，一是支付不方便，[strike]二是有关steam将会被XX的谣言甚嚣尘上[/strike]，直到今年放寒假几天后才买。玩的时候还被老妈盯着，嗯，真是尴尬。
讲真，半条命2的水面特效到了今天仍然不落后于时代，不过其它的特效的确落后于现在的3A大作。但毕竟，国产的仙侠大作真该好好学学半条命2的叙事方式，不要再出现三步一加载，五步一对话这种影响游戏体验的坑爹情况。
最后再唠叨几句，这款游戏跟高恋一起食用效果更佳。

Wow, this thing is almost 13 years old now. I can't believe I never played it before.
Even as a "retro game" it beats most of the games released nowadays.

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
Graphics is old, but for a game released in 2004 its way better than expected. One thing I noticed straight away is how good facial animations are. I don't remember any other game had that at the time.

[h1]Physics[/h1]
As a first person shooter there is so many little things this game does great. Starting with a physics engine, I can easily say that never have I ever played something on this level. Gravity gun (weapon you get in-game) allows you to kill enemies in huge amount of ways with various objects. Other than that, you can interact with almost any object in-game and use it in some way.

[h1]Level Design[/h1]
All of the levels are designed with great attention to detail. You can never get bored exploring all of the corners looking for supplies and ammo. It is not just "run and gun" as most FPS games are today. Some of the levels require you to use a boat, buggy, crane etc. There are also small physics puzzles you can stumble upon that require to be solved in order to proceed. All of this just shows how powerful this game engine is. It's a shame Valve doesn't make more games like this.

[h1]All in all, it's a classic. A must play game for anyone who consider themself a gamer.[/h1]

While I prefer the original's gameplay by a hair, Half-Life 2 presents one of the most hard-hitting and effective narratives in gaming. Also this is the first game with an advanced physics engine, so it's got plenty of historical value as well.

[h1] INTRODUCTION [/h1]

Half-Life 2 is the mother of modern day FPS. This game, along with it's predecessor Half-Life 1 are both regarded as one, if not the best PC games by various critics and gamers alike. It follows the story of Gordon Freeman, a former Black Mesa theoretical physicist.


[h1] REVIEW [/h1]

I bought this game with small expectation since it's a pretty old game, BUT, it managed to surpass those insultng expectation that i had before. Frankly honest, i have played more than a dozen other FPS games, yet none actually feels as complete as this game. It manages to gave the satisfaction of killing enemies i HATED like non others. It manages to got me agitated In the mere sight of a freaking headcrab! There are smart puzzles where you have to think about to get through, while being shooted at by dozens of enemies. I still remember that goosebump when i first got to [spoiler] Ravenholm [/spoiler] , a huge contrast of atmosphere compared to the areas before, or when i had an army of [spoiler] Antlion helping me invade Nova Prospekt [/spoiler] , after savagely trying to rip me into pieces just minutes ago, and also the last part with the new infused [spoiler] gravity gun mk.2 just tearing apart those combines! [/spoiler] AND DOG! THE MOST BADASS CHARACTER IN ANY FPS GAME! Shooting and killing enemies actually felt FANTASTIC. Oh, and those amazing physic aspect of the game! Other fps game, like Call of Duty or Battlefield (single player), pales in comparison. Yes i honestly got frustated many times (not even once in any other fps games, even on veteran) until i had to look up to some guides, but yeah it adds to the satisfaction every single time. OF COURSE it has some flaws in it. No game is perfect. I still can't comprehend WHY is there stupid [spoiler] driving [/spoiler] part in this game, it is very unnecessary and a bit dull. Apart from the [spoiler] Antlion [/spoiler] , the other companions are stupid and useless to say the least. That's all the flaws that i can think of.

[h1] Pros [/h1]

-Physic based puzzle.
-The atmosphere of the game is flawless (except for the [spoiler] driving [/spoiler] part)
-Astoundingly FUN.
-Good story.
-Great pacing (once again, except for the (you know what) part.
-DOG.
-GRAVITY GUN.
-Amazing level design (ONCE AGAIN, except for the (bzz) part.
-Enemy design
-Last but not least, old but gold. And silver. And diamond. And topaz. And.....

[h1] Cons [/h1]

-DR1V1N6 PART.
-Every companions except Antlions.

[h1] Worth it? [/h1]

Absolutely yes. You'll never see fps game the same way again. Old but gold.

[h1] Score [/h1]

9,5/10
